Title: Adds additional objects which a person would be guilty of criminally using drug paraphernalia in the 2nd degree if he or she knowingly possesses or sells such object
Summary: Relates to adding additional objects which a person would be guilty of criminally using drug paraphernalia in the second degree if he or she knowingly possesses or sells such objects.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminally using drug paraphernalia in the second degree
